children.text:
ï»¿Recap + is a software tool to assist you, the professional driver, in the daily task of calculating your DOT Hours of Service Recap and mileage. The calculations it makes relies on accurate data. This tool does not assist you with other sections of your Driver's Daily Log, only the recap and mileage.

This Android app (software product) is distributed 'as is', with no warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including and without limitation, any warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose.

In no event shall any individual, company or organization involved in any way in the development or distribution of this software be liable for any damages whatsoever relating to the use, misuse, or inability to use this software (including, without limitation, damages for loss of profits, business interruption, loss of information, or any other loss).

You, the user assume the entire risk of using the software. Use of this app constitutes your acceptance of these terms. Ignorance of these terms does not release you from them.

What does all this mean?

This software is a tool. Just as a hammer is a tool, but for a different job. If you use this software tool, and end up with incorrect recap values, or worse, a citation, its not the developers, or distributers, fault. Just as if you hit your thumb with a hammer, it isn't the fault of the guy that made the hammer, nor the guy's fault that sold it to you. It's your fault you missed the nail.

Nor can it be counted on to get an entire job done. It is a tool that will assist you, not do it for you, just as a hammer can assist you in building a new home, but it can't build it for you by itself.

It is hoped that you enjoy using Recap. Any bug reports, suggestions, or other comments may be sent to WarSOFTApps@gmail.com. I am a truck driver too, and I will respond to comments and inquiries as soon as I possibly can.
